message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I'm not sure I understand your fairness.  How about we flip it? I'll take 60, and you can have 40.
Considering the inflation, I'll compromise and reduce my share. 57-43 is the new fair split!
I'm willing to meet you halfway on this, but let's keep it simple. 55 for me, 45 for you.  We both get a decent share, and we can finally move on.
I'm willing to meet you closer to halfway, but I still think I deserve a bit more for making the first offer. 54-46 is my new proposal.
We're getting close to the end, and inflation is starting to hurt. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. 50/50 seems fair to me.
